TopicTitle: Howdy y'all!!! from sweet home Alabama!!

Articles.Content: Love the Game and so glad I found it, I hope I stick it out lest I give up due to an inconcievable amount of game and pc crashes. Hope I make it through.

I hope you do too, Bama. Have fun here on the forums! I find there is an amazing community here, and we'll all be sure to answer any questions you may have.

My grandparents used to live in Alabama, where they were a big part of the Montgomery Bus Boycott, so I know Alabama very well. It gets hella hot in the summers though... It was over a hundred degrees (F) the last time I went there for a summer.

OHAI!

Welcome to the home of the asparagus frog! Happy travels.

PS Don't feel bad about the crashes, it's what makes KSP great.. My advice: Switch to Linux

Love the Game and so glad I found it, I hope I stick it out lest I give up due to an inconcievable amount of game and pc crashes. Hope I make it through.

Yeah I'm new as you. I love and very happy to play the game.
hi im a newbie too!!! im enjoying it so far over here in england

Hope to see you guys stick around here, and keep playing the game.
